search_multi.highlightHint: Left-click for next; Right-click for previous
search_multi.explain: Search for files that meet any of the following conditions
search_multi.scope.name: File Name (without extension)
search_multi.scope.head: Heading
search_multi.modal.brief.introduce: Multi-Fields File Searcher allows you to precisely find text files by combining different conditions.
search_multi.modal.brief.conditionDesc: Each condition consists of three parts: scope, operator, and operand, such as {{example1}}, {{example2}}
search_multi.modal.brief.conditionCombination1: Conditions are connected by AND, meaning all conditions must be met. For example, {{example}}
search_multi.modal.brief.conditionCombination2: Conditions are connected by OR, meaning at least one condition must be met. For example, {{example}}
search_multi.modal.brief.conditionCombination3: Adding NOT before a condition means the condition must not be met. For example, {{example}}
search_multi.modal.example.title: Examples
search_multi.modal.example.desc6: Matches the regex \bsour\b (whole word match for sour), and contains pear, and the file modification time is earlier than 2024-05-16
search_multi.modal.example.desc7: YAML Front Matter contains dev, or heading content is plugin, or bold text contains MIT
search_multi.modal.example.desc8: File size exceeds 10KB, and either the file has at least 1000 lines or it contains an image
search_multi.modal.example.desc9: File path contains info or warn or err, and extension does not contain md
search_multi.modal.example.desc10: Table header contains k8s, and H2 contains prometheus, and BlockCode content contains 'kubectl apply'
search_multi.modal.info.diff:
Note the difference:
'head=plugin' means the heading equals plugin
'head:plugin' means the heading contains plugin
search_multi.modal.info.scope:
1. To simplify search, you can omit both scope and operator. In this case, the default scope is `default` and the default operator is `:`
2. The `default` scope means path and content, and the operator `:` means contains
3. Therefore, `pear` is equivalent to `default:pear` and also to `path:pear OR content:pear`
4. This means: search for files whose path or content contains pear
search_multi.modal.usage.whitespaceDesc: Connects two query conditions, meaning logical AND. The document must meet both conditions on either side of the whitespace, equivalent to the word AND
search_multi.modal.usage.orDesc: Connects two query conditions, meaning logical OR. The document must meet at least one of the conditions on either side of the |, equivalent to the word OR
search_multi.modal.usage.notDesc: Precedes a query condition, meaning logical NOT. The document must not meet the condition on the right side of the -, equivalent to the word NOT
search_multi.modal.usage.quotationDesc: Text enclosed in quotes represents a phrase
search_multi.modal.usage.scopeDesc: Scope specifies the attribute to search
search_multi.modal.usage.operatorDesc: Operator connects the scope and operand, representing their matching relationship
search_multi.modal.usage.parenthesesDesc: Parentheses are used to adjust precedence
search_multi.modal.usage.colonDesc: Means text contains or regex matches
search_multi.modal.usage.equalDesc: Means strict equality/inequality for text, number, or boolean
search_multi.modal.usage.scopeDesc.default: Default Scope: default = path + content (path + file content)
search_multi.$label.AUTO_HIDE: Hide Window on Empty and Blur
search_multi.$label.BACKSPACE_TO_HIDE: Hide Window on Empty and Backspace

markdownLint.MD001: Heading levels must increment by one
markdownLint.MD014: Incorrect use of dollar signs for shell commands
markdownLint.MD019: Too many spaces after ATX heading '#'
markdownLint.MD020: No space between heading text and closing ATX heading '#'
markdownLint.MD021: Too many spaces between heading text and closing ATX heading '#'
markdownLint.MD022: Headings must be surrounded by blank lines
markdownLint.MD023: Heading must start at the beginning of the line
markdownLint.MD026: Heading should not end with trailing punctuation
markdownLint.MD028: Blockquotes should not contain blank lines without content
markdownLint.MD029: Inconsistent ordered list item prefixes (1. or sequential)
markdownLint.MD030: List marker should be followed by one space or one tab
markdownLint.MD031: Blockcodes must be surrounded by blank lines
markdownLint.MD032: Lists must be surrounded by blank lines
markdownLint.MD034: Bare URLs must be enclosed in angle brackets
markdownLint.MD036: Avoid using bold/italic text for headings
markdownLint.MD041: First line should be a top-level heading
markdownLint.MD047: File must end with a single newline character
markdownLint.MD056: Inconsistent number of table cells per row
markdownLint.MD058: Tables must be surrounded by blank lines
markdownLint.MD101: MathBlocks must be surrounded by blank lines
